https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/89kHc3uaikDiLIX30ry0jIQn1iF.jpg A filmmaker discovers a box of video tapes depicting two students' disturbing film project featuring a local horror legend, The Peeping Tom. As he sets out to prove this story is real and release it as a work of his own, he loses himself and the film crew following him into his project. Butterfly Kisses
